attributes.action: Knight Anthony McPartlin and Declan Donnelly (aka Ant and Dec)
attributes.additional_details: The many awards that Ant and Dec have won just proves even more how much they deserve this.
attributes.background: I think that Ant and Dec deserve to be Knighted for the work in British Televison they do.They have provide many different types of entertainment for years In the UK and I think it is important to recognise and celebrate this. The are part of TV history and one the most loved presenters in the UK

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
